beer.beer_description: Strawberry Rhubarb Sour is a kettle sour beer made using Maleny Dairies natural yoghurt as the souring culture. Then stewed rhubarb and strawberries were added into the fermenter during secondary fermentation. The resulting beer is light pink in colour and has strawberries on the nose but the taste is anything but sweet. Strong berry flavours develop into sour rhubarb and finish nice and dry.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 80 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 305 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 62!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 95 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 20.

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 240 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 49! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

The classic Berliner Weisse is crisp, cloudy, and sour. Once the most popular beer style in Berlin, it's gained notoriety and popularity around the globe making us all proud to be Berliners. That's 5 different beers with the style of Berliner Weisse. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 120 check-ins with a photo.

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 20 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 5.

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 5 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 185 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 38!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 475 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 96!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 110 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 23!
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 20 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

items.checkin_comment: Interesting sour flavours. Mild sourness and quite refreshing. One of the better sours I’ve had.

user.bio: My other half says I'm a beer snob - I'm ok with that. Making mead and the occasional beer at the moment.

Exploring the world
one beer at a time.
———————————
